content.detailedDescription:
I just happened to walk outside to get some fresh air and and cup of coffee and had happened to grab the video camera on the way out (panasonic tm90) and noticed a rather distinct glowing small object to the nw sort of moving slowly and it seemed to be slightly warm like yellow or cream color - i took some footage of it and it is not very good (i could never see the object on the view screen it was too small i guess) however i did get some images of it a few times accidentally! no sound at all just some car near me playing santana black magic woman - i have seem similar orb like this in spokane on at least three other occasions so it is certainly a repeating event

my first thought when i saw it was it was a ufo as this is way different than any planes or birds or whatever - maybe a balloon? however it did seem to have some sort of odd glow about it - my reactions on first seeing it was “yippie! a ufo!” and i grabbed the camera - i lost sight of it trying to film it toward the end and searched the sky and couldn’t find it i may go back out and try to see it again with tripod next time!
content.summary: A very small round brightish object hovering in the clear blue sky and moving slowly

content.detailedDescription: I arrived at work just before 6 am. a very bright light in the sky caught my attention. it was so perfect that it looked like a whole in the sky.  a strange mist seemed to come out of it, which almost looked like a searchlight through fog, although the sky was perfectly clear. the mist grew to a fan shape, and then into a balloon shape.  the bright light ascended and then descended and then disappeared completely!  i stood and watched for at least another 30 seconds as the mist completely disappeared as well.  i did notice that the mist at first was very white, and then seemed to take on colors, and then faded.
content.summary: Bright round light in sky, emitting a fan shaped mist, then balloon shaped, then ascended and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: We were just having drinks in the back porch and when i got up to go to the toilet i noticed a large flare like orange/white pulsating light moving slowly from the east to west. it didn't look like a plane as it wasn't moving very fast. i doubt it was a helicopter as there was no noise. i quickly went into the house to get my binoculars to have a closer look. up close it was 2 white lights with an orange one in the middle pulsating slowly. the object then changed its path to the north and then disappeared. there were no observable aircraft in the area at the time and this object did not have any navigational lights.
content.summary: Large flare like orange/white pulsating light moving from right to left (e-w)

content.detailedDescription: I have seen flying saucers since august 18, 1980.  this was my 8th ufo experience, but i have never seen orbs, only spaceships.  these were orbs, i think, not what i ususally experience.  i first noticed the object before dinner, but i just blew it off.  we had dinner on the beach, overlooking the water.  my wife noticed it after dinner, when we went to leave.  i immediately saw a large bright light again, much brighter than the first time, approximately 45 earlier.  i knew immediately what it was, a ufo.  we just purchased a camera a few days before, and we went to the waters edge, and started filming.  my wife did.  the object...There were 4-5 of them, were extremely bright, varieng in size from a pin head to a quarter.  i estimate about half a mile to a mile away from shoreline.  they moved independently, and went from bright small in size, to immensely bright and huge, maybe the size of a quarter.  they moved up and down, remained stationary, and one of them went over land when big, over i would assume sandy hook area, 10-15 miles north of where we were.  there were 6-7 people on the beach watching and filming as well.  it was amazing to see.  my feelings...Very excited, very controlled.  i wanted to attract them, and stood in the light than ran across the water and did jumping jacks to attract it.  it did not respond.  the objects got extremely big and bright maybe 3-4 times.  these actions unfortunatlely were not captured on video of photos. i told my wife to take video, to make sure we had it on video.  i spoke to my cousin on the cell phone throughout part of the experience, because he knows of all the things i have experienced, and i was describing the scene to him as it happened. i am very lucky to have experienced what i have throughout my life.  we never lost sight of the objects.  we left after about an hour or so. i have digital video, audio, and photo.  when i enlarged the photo, you see amazing detail of 2 orbs around a tremoundous bright round light, sometimes two bright circles of light.  unfortunately, i do not know how to submit this to you right now, but will have my wife do so in the next few days to a week.  you will be amazed, or maybe not, since this is probably common.  but it is amazing, and i would like an explanation as to what this is...I believe it is extra terrestrial.  my wife thinks it was secret military craft, but she also said she did not know what it was. she does not believe in ufo, since she has never seen one, but then, she could not explain what we saw and filmed.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orb 4-5 of them over the ocean extremely bright and large at times have excellent photos and video

content.detailedDescription:
At approx. 3:45 pm, i was at my home, watching the hd earthviewing camera from the iss (awe-inspiring view!) the objects were immediately noticeable, as this is a familiar view that i watch frequently. i did not know exactly what the objects were, just that i had never seen them before. i had prepared my lunch and just sat down to eat when i focused on the screen, upon which i nearly threw the plate in the floor, and yelled "holy s--t!" i grabbed the laptop and did the screen shot, as the objects were already recessing away into the darkness. i quickly showed the screen to my oldest son, who was sitting next to me when this happened.

this is as best as i can remember what happened:  the iss had just passed over the southern tip of peru (i also had loaded the isstracker-real-time), and was out over the atlantic. the camera had been cutting in and out, and when it came back on, the objects were on-screen. i did a quick screen capture. there is one disc that is readily visible, with a half-circle of 5, fainter discs and possibly one more off to the right of the half-circle. the best visible one (closest to the iss) appears to be soft orange in color, the remainder of the objects are faint enough that the color is not apparent. all the objects appear to have domes. part of the iss is clearly visible on the right and the earth visible at the bottom of the image. there are smudges on the window where the camera is located--these are visible whenever the light from the sun is located appropriately--these tiny smudges are also grouped on the window towards the right of the iss. the discs did not remain visible more than 15 seconds, as they slowly faded back away from the iss, and never broke the formation they were in when sighted.
content.summary: Appr. 6-7 discs hovering off of the iss, slowly receded away into space

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i headed to wild willy's hot spring just outside mammoth lakes at 5:30 am before the sunrise.  shortly after arriving, at about 5:45 am, he said he saw a strange shooting star to the west.  i looked but did not see anything at that time.  about 10 to 15 minutes later, i saw a sphere or disc of light as bright as the moon appear about 20 degrees above the horizon to the west.  although i first thought it was a searchlight of some aircraft, it was clearly too large to belong to any aircraft.  there was no sound at all.  a trail formed to the left of the object, and it ascended and appeared to head directly toward us, increasing in size.  it started to descend, having formed a noticeable arc, then the light started to dim, and disappeared altogether.  i grabbed my cell phone and shot two photos of it, the latter photo included the moon to the upper left of the object for comparison.
you can see the trail and it shows that the object arched upwards and then descended, bearing the trail above it as it came toward us.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright orb appeared in the western sky, formed trail, ascended coming toward us towards the east, then descended, dimmed, then disappeared .

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in the back yard star gazing, saw a bright light, larger than any star, bright like a jet's headlights but only one and much too large not to hear any sound. it was suddenly above in the sky west ward, toward the pacific ocean. we watched the light, very bright, mist appeared to come from it, not like a jet with a stream in a line behind it but rather a round ball-shaped mist. there wasn't a cloud in the sky to explain such a thing. the light ascended, then descended slightly and suddenly went out leaving the mist visible for a few more seconds before it was no longer visible to my naked eye.
content.summary: Bright light with a mist emitting, ascented then quick descent then disappears, mist remained a few seconds

content.detailedDescription: Three of us were watching the sky up in the bwca on a clear night, when we saw two large bright round yellow lights.  they shone themselves for about 5-10 seconds and then shut off one after the other.  ten minutes later, three lights appeared in a different spot above the tree line. then again, after about ten minutes they reappeared in the original space, but this time there were at least three bright lights or objects.  each time they only appeared for 5-10 seconds.  they were a bright yellow-orange color  and definitely bigger than an airplane or other known flying object.
content.summary: Two bright yellow-orange lights stationary in sky for 5-10 seconds.  reappearing in same place 10 minutes later.  also appeared in a different spot again after 10 minutes.  all three sightings lasted only 5-10 seconds each.

content.detailedDescription:
Was outside in hot tub looking west and ufo appeared,stationary, tear shape with also a whale tail shape.  white,foggy/misty appearance, within 100 miles away then sped north and disappeared. first thought was a ufo.
not unsettled by it.  just another phenomenon.  9/12/14 @ 6:12 a.M.
content.summary: Ufo spotted misty/foggy-stationary, with whale shaped tail, then zipped north&disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: At 6am this morning of september 12,2014 i went out to my front porch, sat on my steps to have my morning coffee. i started to look around at the sky and all of a sudden looking to my left into the sky a bright white light appeared, just appeared out of no where. it didn't come to like a plane nor helicopter. it just appeared. this morning the sky was clear, no fog or anything!  it seemed very close. at first i wasn't sure what to think, i was shaking from the inside out. a couple sec's went by and i grabbed my cell phone to take pictures of this object. it then started to emit what looked like a fog-like mist from the bottom of the object. there was no sound, no smell...Nothing... as quick as it came, is as quick as it went out poof, like a lightbulb!!! left me feeling rattled to the core like something very un-holy just had happened! i'm still uneasy about what i had witnessed. my boyfriend was on his way to work at the time of this incident, i had text him about it and sent the pictures i took as well. he said he had seen the light and at first thought it was the moon, and then realized it was not. but, he proceeded on to work not giving it a second thought until he received the text and pictures that i sent.
content.summary: Bright white sphere light all of sudden appeared from nowhere, fog-like substance admitted below.

content.detailedDescription:
Night before last i saw a ufo. it was a plain as the nose on your face.

i was driving home from work after making my delivery and when i got about 2 miles outside of asheboro, nc on i-73, i-74, i saw something i hadn't seen before and i make this trip every day. i looked to my left about 2 or 3 miles ahead (it was dark) and there are some power poles/towers  together that have some white lights going up the sides of them. they are not the tallest towers around, because there are a bunch of them around the few mile stretch of road, but those two are the closet two that are together.  as i got closer i noticed the color turquoise was illuminating from between the two towers. the closer i got the more distinguished it became and at 1st i thought it had to be a blimp. but then i realized it wasn't big enough. it was about half the size of a blimp. i kept looking for some kind of support under it like posts or metal legs holding it up and then i thought it must be a water tower they just put up, but i saw none when i got closer and it actually moved just a bit. i noticed as i got closer it had a string red lights all the way around it protruding like saturn’s halo but i think was attached. when i got as close as i could, which was about probably a ¼- ½ mile to my left off through the woods, i saw it the best i could. it was the shape of a sphere. almost like you would see in a cheesy sci fi movie form the 50’s. illuminated in turquoise with the red lights going around it.
it was actually chaos on the road as others saw it and were struggling to continues to drive straight as they tried to make out what they saw. i thought i’d be side swiped, the only thing that saved it from happening was there wasn’t very many cars on the road…i saw 2 cars pull over, but i was afraid to, because i feared someone would ass end me looking at the site as opposed to seeing me on the shoulder, so i reached for my iphone to take a pic/video and struggled to get it on and just as i held it up, the damn trees blocked my view. so i drove real slow for the next mile hoping to get a break in the trees as everybody else did as well. the speed limit is 65 there and everybody was doing 40. i took my exit about a mile later to go off on the split where i-74 leaves i-73 and hoped to get to an elevated spot where i could still see it. finally as i began to give up i looked back and turned my neck as far as i could and i saw it! it had taken off and was headed due west (i was headed north) and it had climbed high in a short amount of time, and it looked like a green airliner disappearing in the night sky. in about 3 minutes or so approx, i saw what appeared to be an air force jet go by high in the sky in that direction. i also saw about 6-7 nc state police doing about 100 mph headed south toward where i just came from.
content.summary: Turquoise sphere seen next to power lines/towers hovering

content.detailedDescription:
Early morning just before the first signs of dawn i was walking on the wetlands, using a trail made for bikes/ped that circles the old dump in american canyon. i checked my watch at 5:55 (4min fast)... i looked up from my watch at the moon, clear sky - no prominent clouds or features caught my attention - and for various reasons i try to pay attention to the sky. i look at the watch, look at the moon, get my coat on and take my hairtie off - look back toward the moon in the west and there is a very odd cloud in the sky.
"comet?" was my first thought. "but no comets have been forecast"
the shape of the cloud is what made me think this... but right away there was a obvious issue with any comet hypothesis... the cloud was in a circular formation. i wasn't sure what i was seeing.
i was alone, so i gave it my undivided attention.
 i pulled my phone ding the best i could to not take my eyes off the scene- but my camera on my s3 wouldnt pick up anything in the low light.
whatever it was it was picture worthy for sure.

hand open at arms length, the cloud appeared to be that size, in a 8o'clock to 3 o'clock clockwise swirl, starting diffuse and broadened at the 8 position, more or less tightening into the "comet"- 12 to 3 segment, with a very luminous cloud of water(like)vapor, to the glowing bright "starlike" point of light at the head of the "comet" (3 o'clock).
wish i had a picture but, hope that helps.

right away my impression was that this was a static formation.
no visible changes right away. i stood there watching for 15 - 20 seconds before i noticed any change in the scene. the point of light at the nose of the comet moved slowly out of the "nose" - leaving a "horn" or a pointed trail of cloud as it moved - until it was well apart from the cloud.
the "object" that moved slowly out of the cloud on a linear trajectory grew dim until it seemed to be stationary again at the brightness of nearby stars - some one finger width away from the cloud where it made its exit.

it could've been a man made rocket or something, i have never seen anything like it, but i also have never seen a space flight. just the thought that this could be some project of ours makes me feel like a moron for writing all of this. there have been folks i have ultimate trust in who say that they have witnessed rockets or missiles flying into orbit from the bay area....

[item moved/cms/nd]

it would be cool to get a look at some photos if there are any- "sunol" describes something like what i saw with some mention of "shadows" and "craft"... while i only saw a light.

anyway... hope this helps someone else feel like they know someone else saw what they did- perty much all mufon is good for.
thanks mufon.

[item moved/cms/nd]
content.summary: Early am comet-like cloud, point of light traveled out of it

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 5:55 am entire crew witnessed a bright light appearing near, but below the moon in the southwestern sky. the light appeared at first to be aircraft landing lights as though shining through a fog, but remained somewhat stationary and the direction the light shine did not change much as an aircraft's  landing lights would if it were turning. the light originated from a bright point and fanned out. it reminded me of the spiral light above norway a few years ago. the bright origin light separated from the fan-shaped tail and quickly faded out. the fan-shaped tail or cloud was still visible for a short time after the origin light had faded.I've attached two digital photos, one by me and one by a co-worker who photographed it from a different location.
content.summary: Light appeared casting a fan shaped trail. trail looked somewhat like light pattern through fog/mist, but there was no fog. fan grew larger, then the original light emerged from fan & quickly faded then disappeared. fan trail remained visible briefly

content.detailedDescription: Please contact. i am a high net-worth individual who was abducted in my youth. many years have passed, i have been silent about this event. i wish to speak in person with abductions team before offering any more information.
content.summary: Abduction took place years ago. i am now coming forward to report as much information as i am able.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog in a westbound direction when i first noticed a small reddish "star" low in the southern california south western horizon.  i thought it might be mars or jupiter but as i continued to look at it the "star" appeared to be moving in my direction.  very imperceptible at first but then faster as it got closer to my location.  then the reddish "star" became bright white and at that point grew huge as though it exploded very much as they depict a supernova for illustrative purposes on television.  as it "exploded" or "disintegrated" it was like a white mist and then it disappeared.  i thought what i saw looked absolutely amazing.
content.summary: Red star to white star to explosion or supernova white mist

content.detailedDescription: Woke up around 5:30am, went to the kitchen, as i was walking back to my bedroom i noticed a round ball in the sky that looked similar to moon but it had rays of light beaming down from the object.  one of the rays blinked and that is what caught my attention.  i thought it was a plane, but then noticed something unusal.  i ran to get my phone to record by the time i got back to the object, the light was slow ascending into the object while both light and object simultaneously disappeared.
content.summary: Hovering light couple beams and disappeared slowly into the sky

content.detailedDescription: Driving to work ray of light towards ground then straight out, appeared like was in mist or cloud yet it was very clear sky. this thing just slowly yet not really slow, cant explain it just weird,disintegrated or disappeared. never seen anything like it. the sightings in los banos, ca , sunol ca, pixley,ca and desert hot springs, ca appear to have seen what i seen. i feel very strongly they seen what i seen.
content.summary: Rays of light towards grnd then straight then gone

content.detailedDescription: Got up at 5:00 to watch iss at 5:04 am and do outside exercises. saw moon in the west and them saw candy corn shaped white cloud at 5 o'clock from the moon. it looked like a plane coming through a fog, but there were no pin point lights on it just a white object in the sky. i looked to see if there were any other clouds in the sky but no. and also no mist.  after about 1 min it just dissipated,,,end of sighting  this occurred at exactly 6 am on 9/12/14
content.summary: Saw cnady corn shaped object in sky looked like a plane in a mist but no mist

content.detailedDescription: 6am 9/12/2014. went outside backyard faces west let dog out sit  & have coffee. i m close to psp. this appeared. @ first as a plane coming from lax headed east. but noticed very bright spot lite faced down towards ground like a police helicopter cutting thru fog. as a former pilot i thought this is odd being lite out and 100% clear blue sky. i walked inside house grabbed my phone & put it on video camera & it was gone
content.summary: At first an airplane, very bright lite faced toward ground like it was cutting thru fog, but was clear out not a cloud anywhere went inside got i-phone to record & it was gone

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was just getting off work
2.  i  looked at moon and noticed the light
3. i thought it was a plane but it was hovering and then started to disappear 
4. the light hovered then faded away
5. was lost for words no idea what it was
content.summary: Hovering light changes shape and disinter grated

content.detailedDescription: I work in sunol california and start at 5 am, there isn't a cloud in the sky and can totally see the stars and the nearly full moon, i suddenly notice a bright cloud of some sort, it gave the appearance of being in the marine layer of the bay area and the sun is poking through at a certain point in the sky, but the problem was it was still dark and there was no marine layer. i then saw some sort of craft flying away from this cloud almost a shadow type of appearance, it was far away so it had to be very large, i thought it may have been above the water in the south bay but very well could have been over the ocean as this occurrence happened fairly high in the sky. i only saw the craft fly away slowly for a few seconds, but the cloud stayed bright and slowly dissipated over about 3 to 4 minutes until it disappeared completely, i then could see the stars again in the background. someone in los banos reported something this morning that seemed very similar to what i saw and also in the same direction of the west but about 2 hours prior to my sighting. i am very curious if anyone else saw this in the san francisco bay area?
content.summary: Illuminated cloud appeared, then seen an object fly away from this cloud

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down dodson ave and when i came to the stop sign at dodsone & n bedell is when i noticed a glowing green roman candle like shaped object moving across the sky leaving behind a trail as a roman candle would streaking towards the sky but this was moving horizontally and then broke off into two objects both moving similar and in the same direction until it just instantly disappeared. no trace, no trail, nothing. and there was no sound at all during this event or other objects in the sky (planes,jets, helicopters).
content.summary: Green roman candle shape object in the night sky breaks into two objects

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my front yaed smking a cigarette and i seen something in the westen horizon moving, like maybe a helicopter, i thought. i watched and waited to see what direction it would go and looked for the typical blinking lights, as well as the sound. there was no sound and no blinking lights. i was not moving horizontally either. i kept watching this thing as it continued to climb up towards the clouds. the clouds were very slight,the sky was pretty much clear, except for this one whispy cloud. the object was emitting a reddish-orange light and was cylindrical to almost rocket shaped, like a space capsule, i guess would be is how it appeared to me. i watched it as it kept going up and up and finally disapeared in the sky. i went straight up, the whole thing only lasted about one minute, maybe one and half minutes at most. it happened a 3:55am pst. this is the 3rd sight of this object i have seen in the last 30 days. there's something going on over here, and i just wish i could get some pictures, but i can't know when they will show up again!
content.summary: I looked to the west sky horizon and seen an object with a bright light ascend until it disappeared in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was awoken in the early morning by a crazy storm, it was non stop thundering and lightning and i filmed for about 2 minutes. and going back i noticed during the lightning at 55 seconds a black mass that appeared to be on the ground at 59 seconds it looks like a entity flying, then at 107 it looks lije a craft of some kind flying up and then disappears.
content.summary: I filmed a stormed rewatched and saw something odd in the lightning

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my deck when i noticed a glowing/pulsating orange light in the ne sky about the altitude of an airplane, i called to my wife to come look at this "ufo" to play a joke on her thinking it was a satellite or such, when she came out onto the deck this aircraft stopped pulsing moved towards us briefly then made a 90 degree angle and took off into the sky disappearing. a movement that seemed very unnatural and very smooth.  during our experience we both became captivated, and a dreadful feeling came over us which watered our eyes and was actually terrifying because without speaking we knew that what originated as a gag was actually was an unknown object, it took our breath away and caused our hearts to beat out of our chest. there was no clear definition to the craft just an orange sphere like pulsing light that became solid orange once the movement began. the whole experience lasted about 5 minutes. i served in the military, have experienced many things, but nothing like this, visually or emotionally.
content.summary: Orange glowing light hovered, then made an l shaped path then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I often sit on the back deck, enjoy the night skies.  occasionally, i notice stars blinking, or rather, strange lights flickering.  one night in particular, july 15th, 2014, i was out back at 3:30 a.M.  in the sky to my west, i noticed blinking lights that seemed not so normal.  sure wasn't the big or little dipper.  one light had a red glow surround it.  i had an overwhelming feeling that it was not stars, but, maybe i was sighting an unidentified object.  i taped a video on my cell phone before running to the neighbor for his witness. standing on the lawn, he convinced me that the only activity i was seeing was planes and stars.  the next day, i knocked on neighbors door to show him the video on my cell phone.  i had watched it maybe 20 times, and wanted to ask opinion of neighbor even though he had already expressed i was just seeing things.  before i could get a word in, he wanted to show me something.  the very spots we had stood the night before, now were circles of dead grass.  it appeared burned, brown, not green like the entire yard.  wow.  then i shared the video and he agreed, i saw something he did not that last night.  i since have watched the video almost daily, questioning what exactly i think i am seeing.  please look at my photos and video.  zoom the photos close and please respond to me with an explanation.  i am willing to answer any questions you may have.  thank you from the midwest.
*note-the event was sighted longer than the video
content.summary: blinking lights on a clear night red flame like glow

content.detailedDescription:
When walking through a field on our property the morning of sunday, september 7, 2014.  the circles appeared sometime between 6:30 p.M. friday, september 5, 2014 and 10:30 a.M. on sunday, september 7, 2014.

there are 8 8ft circles in circumference and 7 13ft circles in circumference.  there are also several half circles, that would be of the same size.  many of the circles intersect. the circles were in the lower of two fields close to a  creek.  (there are two fields near each other.  the field that was at a higher elevation and had power lines overhead was not touched.)

the vegetation does not appear to be damaged.  it wasn't crushed or uprooted.  the circles appear as dark very fine powder like material.  there isn't a noticeable odor associated with the substance.  the substance can be brushed off the vegetation.  samples of vegetation with the substance were collected along with vegetation without the substance. 

we checked the area again on wednesday, september 10, 2014.   there doesn't appear to be any change in the circles with the exception that they did not appear as dark and pronounced.  (could be due to growth of vegetation.)

digital photos, taken on wednesday, september 10, 2014 is attached.  we also have digital photos and digital videos taken shortly after the circles were found however we have not uploaded the first photos yet.  

we spoke to a few people with history in the area and no one has seen or heard anything like this previously.
content.summary: Found unknown set of intertwined circles in field

content.detailedDescription: I'm currently on vacation in kill devil hills in the obx, nc.  i walked out onto the beach to do some night time surf fishing.  while setting up at 9:25 p.M. (i know the exact time because i shot a video with my phone, but unfortunately the quality is too poor to post or show proof.  it just looks like small blurry pin dots of light in the video), i noticed approximately 12-15 orange/red fireball orbs coming up the coast from the south.  my immediate thought was someone set off chinese lanterns from some type of ceremony.  however, they were moving much too fast for a chinese lantern in the wind, and the wind was blowing in an easterly direction while the objects made a very clear and lengthy path from south to north before turning east out towards sea.  the objects were in a loose group and not a patterned formation.  they moved from the south, up the coast line.  before reaching my location, the objects turned from their northern direction and headed east out to sea.  the objects made no noise and disappeared as they headed east and appeared to increase in elevation.  approximately 10-15 minutes later another identical fireball too a similar flight path by itself.  and then another 10-15 minutes later, a second individual identical fireball orb made a similar flight path.  others on the beach witnessed this occurrence and i spoke to some of them asking what they thought it was.  nobody knew, and everyone agreed it was strange.  it was a mostly clear night with a few clouds and the moon is close to full.  the objects all appeared to move in a fluid motion.  there was no starting, stopping or apparent change in speed.  there were a few planes around the area, but it was very evident that they were planes with their red and green lights and noise.  these objects appeared larger than the planes and as significantly brighter glowing orange/red fireball orbs with no distinct shape, design or sound from my vantage point.
content.summary: Red/orange fireball orb with no sound

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting in panama city beach, florida on the balcony of condo, approximately 10:25pm-10:30pm. 

my partner and i were on the balcony looking out at the sky. we noticed a light directly in front of us over the ocean. the object was too far away to determine it's shape, but it was blinking in a wild pattern. the object moved very quickly across the sky. it appeared from the horizon, moving towards us, and within aa minute it disappeared. a few seconds later it was on the other side of the sky and then vanished. as we scanned the sky to find the object, i discovered an apparently different object floating fairly close to us. i'd say within about 500 feet, give or take, just about two condos down the beach. when we first saw this object, we weren't sure what it was. it was just unlike anything else.  

i locked onto it with binoculars and it was such a bright color, it almost didn't look real. my partner took a turn as well and determined it was a cylindrical shape. it was redish-orange and was pulsating in and out as it ascended above the condo at an angle. it didn't seem to be rotating or making any movements besides ascending. my partner said it looked like it was facing one direction, while moving in another. 

when we first sighted the object we were in a state of intrigue. we knew nothing commercial would be flying that close to a condo, and a kite would not glow to that degree, much less pulsate. we reacted by grabbing the binoculars and never taking our eyes off it. it made my heart pound and it's like we couldn't stop watching it. even now that it's gone, it feels like we should be looking for it. once it flew over that condo we raced to the front balcony to see if we could still see it, but it was gone. we kept watch for at least 30 minutes afterwards, pacing back and forth from balcony to balcony, but we never spotted it again. 

*i have included a 24 second video. it was shot with an iphone camera so it's not very great. you can see, on the left side of the video though, that there is an object moving very, very slowly. this video does not do justice and is probably useless, but i felt i should include it anyway.
content.summary: Saw two objects move across ocean, one fairly close moving over condos

content.detailedDescription: My dog barked in an unusual manner, so i let him out to investigate and i looked up and saw saw a re-orange glowing object? streak left to right, appearing and dissapearing within seconds. it was not a plane, and it disappeared into thin air.  the dog barked at nothing, for several minutes.
content.summary: Red-orange orb streaked across sky
